alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued May 07 at 3:47AM PDT until May 08 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents and breaking waves due to elevated surf of 3 to 6 feet with local sets to 7 feet. * WHERE...Malibu Coast and Los Angeles County Beaches. * WHEN...Through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...There is an increased risk of drowning due to the hazardous conditions. Rip currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Waves can wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats nearshore. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Surf may increase on Sunday, and a High Surf Advisory may be needed for west-facing beaches.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water due to hazardous swimming conditions, or stay near occupied lifeguard towers. Stay off rock jetties, since they can be deadly locations in such conditions.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches
